title: Disclosure in Red
text:
Disclosure in Red is the first studio album by the Norwegian <a href="gothic%20metal">gothic metal</a> band, <a href="Trail%20of%20Tears%20%28band%29">Trail of Tears</a>.
Track listing.
All music by Trail of Tears except "Illusion?" by Frank Ørland.
All lyrics by R. Thorsen and H. Michaelsen
